title: Dark Vengeance LFP Marksman main!
body:
Hey there, **Dark Vengeance** is looking for a Marksman (ADC) around **High Silver / Low Gold** to play in the team. 

A few things to note;
- Player MUST live in Western Australia
- Be able to use Discord for Team Communication
- Available to attend RFLan events
- Team Practice is setup around player's availability

You're more than welcome to add me on Discord or League, or even reply on this thread.
As for now we aren't playing much as a team as Pre-Season is stopping our team practice. 
I'm looking forward to seeing you online! Thanks guys!

**IGN:** DV Silent Resent
**Discord:** http://www.discord.gg/t8YzHNx
**RFLan:** http://www.rflan.org
